State.Author: Anakin
State.Description:
This add-in improves the personalization of your hero and his followers.

With this add-in, the game doesn\'t choose starting abilities and characteristics of your hero and your followers at your place.
State.Name: Advanced Party

Original.Name: Awakening in the OC Core Resource Extension v1-920-1-0.rar

State.Author: Jake Zahn
State.Description: Extends the game\'s Core Resources with Awakening\'s resources.
State.Name: Awakening in the OC

State.Author: FollowTheGourd
State.Description: Readability improvements for cutscenes, the quest journal, the codex, conversation history, tooltips, the inventory, and other various menus. There\'s still lots more to go and more versions to come.
State.Name: FtG UI Mod - More Readable Fonts and UI

State.Author: Amycus
State.Description: Adds armor and weapons from DA2 to DA:O
State.Name: Kirkwall Exports

State.Author: Qwinn
State.Description: New workaround hotfix for the rare but dreaded Skin Deep/Dereliction of Duty/Scrolls of Banastor bug.  You should install even if it hasn't affected you yet! This fixpack attempts to address ALL dialogue, quest, scripting, plot, and most item bugs in the base game of Dragon Age: Origins.  It also restores much previously inaccessible content.
State.Name: Qwinn's Ultimate DAO Fixpack v3.52

State.Author: Ketaros
State.Description: Complete overhaul of the icons used for all equipment, this changes the bland & indifferent look to something much more vibrant & variant. Check it out
State.Name: The Icons Project

State.Author: SarahCousland and Tinimaus
State.Description: This mod extends the ending of the battle of Ostagar (contains spoilers). It adds two new cutscenes and two new pre-filmed movies, showing details of the devastating aftermath of the battle, what happened to Alistair and the Warden after the tower ambush, and Flemeth's unexpected rescue. Lore-friendly. For all races, genders, and origins.
State.Name: Tinimaus and SarahCousland's - the Rescue at Ishal

State.Author: AmstradHero
State.Description: The blight is over, but the darkspawn threat is far from finished. In the Frostback mountains rumours of dangerous beasts threaten to plunge Fereldan and Orlais into chaos and war once again.
State.Name: The Shattered War

State.Author: Symonius
State.Description:
This module adds a new mage class specialization called Lich that allows the character to become a powerful necromancer and use spells to drain life and animate dead corpses.



The specialization is available after you get the Blood Mage spec achievement and grants +0.25 combat health and mana regeneration.
State.Name: Lich Specialization

State.Author: Snfonseka
State.Description: This mod gives additional reward items to the player character when he / she completes the Chanter’s Board Quests in Lothering.
State.Name: Lothering Chantry Quest Rewards

State.Author: Symonius
State.Description:
This mod unlocks new powers when the main character drinks the high dragon's blood from Kolgrim.



The powers are added, like a chosen specialization, only to the main character that drinks the blood.

Dragon Disciple also grants +2 Constitution and +5% Fire Resistance.
State.Name: Dragon Disciple Powers

State.Author: Symonius
State.Description:
This mod focuses on allowing the warrior character to became a powerful Seeker of Truth, a divine agent of the Andrastian Chantry.



The specialization is available after you gain the Templar specialization and grants +6 Mental Resistance and +2 Willpower.
State.Name: Seeker Of Truth Specialization

State.Author: Symonius
State.Description:
This mod focuses on allowing the character to embody true chivalrous values and defeat worthy opponents as much as protecting allies.



The specialization is available either after you save the Redcliffe village from the undeads or after you heal Arle Eamon and grants +2 Constitution and +2 Willpower.
State.Name: Knight Specialization

State.Author: Symonius
State.Description:
This mod is based on the lore of Inquisition and allows a warrior character to become a descendant of the Emerald Knights, an elite order of fierce elven warriors of the Dales.



The specialization is available after you gain the Poacher achievement and grants +2 Dexterity and +2 Willpower.
State.Name: Emerald Knight Specialization

State.Author: Symonius
State.Description:
This mod is an expansion of the army you command at the final battle.



Every vanilla army is now expanded with new units (knights and archers for Redcliffe, crossbowman and vanguards for Orzammar and so on)



There are also 3 new armies you can unlock for the climax: Corrupted Circle, Wild Creatures and Undeads.
State.Name: Climax Army Enhanced

State.Author: Symonius
State.Description:
This module adds a new mage class specialization called Beastmaster that allows the summoning of animal companions and some spirits to help you in battle, like the ranger spec do with the Rogue.



The specialization is immediately available after the "Last of the Wardens" achievement and grants +2 Willpower and +5 Nature resistance.
State.Name: Beastmaster Specialization - Druid Expansion

State.Author: Mad Method - S I L E N C E R
State.Description: This updated tool patches all the DLC items so they transfer properly to Awakenings. UPDATED version for both GOG and STEAM users.
State.Name: DLC Transfer To Awakening Patch (UPDATED)

State.Author: Mad Method - S I L E N C E R
State.Description: This updated tool patches all the DLC items so they transfer properly to Awakenings. UPDATED version for both GOG and STEAM users.
State.Name: DLC Transfer To Awakening Patch (UPDATED)

State.Author: Mad Method - S I L E N C E R
State.Description: This updated tool patches all the DLC items so they transfer properly to Awakenings. UPDATED version for both GOG and STEAM users.
State.Name: DLC Transfer To Awakening Patch (UPDATED)

State.Author: sapphim
State.Description: Restoration of cut Oghren content
State.Name: Bye Oghren - Dialogue Restoration

State.Author: Entopie
State.Description: Armor and weapon ports from DA2 to DAO
State.Name: Loincloth Fashion

State.Author: TommyIrianto
State.Description: This mod will give you DA2 style Grey Warden armors and weapons for DA:O. This mod also changes the appearances of all Grey Warden NPCs into wearing a uniform Grey Warden armors.
State.Name: Grey Wardens of Ferelden

State.Author: Snfonseka
State.Description:
Mod Description

This mod adds additional items to the players\' inventory as a reward for completing the \"Lost to the Memories\" successfully (Orta will give these items to the player).

1.	Tome of the Arcane Technique Second Edition (spell book)
2.	Stone Warrior Statuette (gift)
3.	Small Carved Statuette (gift)
4.	Grandmaster Silverite Ru
State.Name: Lost to the Memories Rewards

State.Author: JOG
State.Description:
This is a modification of the Human Noble Background. It changes your start equipment, so that you actually look like a child of Ferelden\'s second highest noble house.

When the game progresses you gain proper equipment for a noble.
State.Name: Of Noble Cast

State.Author: Snfonseka
State.Description:
Mod Description

This mod adds additional items to the players\' inventory as a reward for completing the Ritual successfully (it appears as the items are given by Duncan)
State.Name: Joining Ritual Rewards

State.Author: Snfonseka
State.Description: This mod gives additional reward items to the player character when he / she completes the Chanter’s Board Quests (except in Lothering).
State.Name: Chantry Quest Rewards

State.Author: DarthParametric
State.Description: Adds scaled clothes models to fit kids, including commoner and noble clothes, mage robes, and medium armour. A resource pack for modders.
State.Name: Additional Clothing for Kids (Mod Resource)

State.Author: Schwinni
State.Description: Fixes the bug in Awakening that the High Dragon in the Dragonbone Wastes doesn\'t drop the Blackblade Gloves and Boots.
State.Name: Awakening Blackblade Armor Dragon Drop Fix

State.Author: i9h
State.Description: Resolves several outstanding issues with the cutscene at [url=http://dragonage.wikia.com/wiki/Depths_of_Depravity#The_Nest]the end[/url] of Awakening.
State.Name: Awakening endgame cutscene fixes

Original.Name: Awakening in the OC - Expanded Integration-5181-1-2-0-1607036162.7z

State.Author: darthbdaman
State.Description: Fixes, tweaks, and expansions to the Origins content, in order to better integrate the Awakening in the OC mod features into the game.
State.Name: Awakening in the OC - Expanded Integration

State.Author: darthbdaman
State.Description: Fixes, tweaks, and expansions to the Origins content, in order to better integrate the Awakening in the OC mod features into the game.
State.Name: Awakening in the OC - Expanded Integration

State.Author: Terra_Ex
State.Description: This mod fixes the infamous Silverite Mines equipment glitch that causes you to permanently lose some/all of the equipment on your player character. With this fix installed the scene involving the Architect & Utha will display correctly (not against a black backdrop) and your equipment will be correctly removed at the appropriate time.
State.Name: Awakening Silverite Mines Bugfix

State.Author: Elegant
State.Description: Correctly increases your desired stat or unlocks access to the Blood Mage specialization should you demand greater payment from the Baroness in the fade. This is for Awakening.
State.Name: Baroness Reward Fix

State.Author: SpecMechanic
State.Description: Bugfixes for the quest "Bombs Away!" for Awakening.
State.Name: Bombs Away Quest Fix

State.Author: LevanaFay
State.Description: Gets rid of the boob patches on the Female Mage robes. Nothing more, nothing less.
State.Name: Boob patches be gone

State.Author: theskymoves
State.Description: Changes the gear on the guards accompanying King Alistair or Queen Anora so they don't look like templars.
State.Name: TSM DAA Bodyguards Tweak

State.Author: theskymoves
State.Description: In Witch Hunt, edits both of Ariane’s longswords to use the ‘Dar'Misaan’ model, rather than some mis-matched shemlen nonsense.
State.Name: TSM Dalish Weapons for Ariane

State.Author: darthbdaman
State.Description: Moves the various promotional and DLC reward items from the player's starting inventory into Bodahn's camp store, Yuriah inventory in Vigil's Keep, and Sandal's store in the Circle Tower.
State.Name: DLC Item Integration

State.Author: The13thBlackCat
State.Description: Just a little resize of the in-game drakes and dragons. Nothing huge, just makes them a bit bigger.
State.Name: Drakes n Dragons Resized

State.Author: Kaizoku-Gal
State.Description: Retexture for Duncan’s armor based on the Grey Warden armors from DA2 Legacy DLC.
State.Name: Duncan's armor Legacy inspired retexture

State.Author: MachDelta
State.Description: This is a quick and simple mod that changes the chances of melee kills becoming \"Deathblows\", aka those nifty scripted hack-em-up sequences!
State.Name: Forced Deathblows

State.Author: ViLiSSa
State.Description: HD (2048x2048) replacer for default presets
State.Name: HD Eyebrow and Stubble presets

State.Author: Ryan Paul Fialcowitz
State.Description: Overhaul of various items in the game.
State.Name: Item Overhaul

State.Author: i9h
State.Description: Sigrun or Velanna can now undergo the Joining ritual if they are recruited as part of the third (and last) main quest.
State.Name: Joining ritual fix for Awakening companions

State.Author: Elegant
State.Description: This fix will correct all problems caused by Law & Order but will only take effect if it is installed before the actual quest is accepted.
State.Name: Law and Order Fixes

State.Author: dainbramage
State.Description: More detailed tooltips
State.Name: More Detailed Tooltips

Original.Name: NEUTRAL FEMALE ARMOR (Medium and High edition)-4462-1-1.zip

State.Author: magpiedragon
State.Description: Replaces vanilla meshes for Medium and Heavy female armors for all races with more unisex ones. Includes edited armor textures to match. No more boobplate.
State.Name: Neutral Female Armor (Medium and Heavy edition)

State.Author: MaryseDynasty
State.Description: Currently this mod changes Origins Vallaslin to the versions from Inquisition, or at least, the versions I re-made from scratch.
State.Name: Origins Vallaslin Changes

State.Author: Pineappletree
State.Description: This is a set of 11 new eye color tints, replacing (but not overwriting!) the DA:O originals.
State.Name: Pineappletree s Eye Color Replacement

State.Author: Pineappletree
State.Description: This adds 48 new hair & eyebrow colors, 40 new skin tones and 30 new eye colors to the Character Creator and replaces the 11 eye colors originally shipped with DA:O.
State.Name: Pineappletree s Vibrant Colors

State.Author: blaidd
State.Description: This is a tiny Mod which removes pixelation when Bloom, Depth of Field are applied. No more ugly pixels in front of your face!
State.Name: Pixelated Shaders begone

State.Author: dalishious
State.Description: Gives the warden and Alistair prison clothes when captured at Fort Drakon.
State.Name: Prison Clothes

State.Author: Qwinn
State.Description: New workaround hotfix for the rare but dreaded Skin Deep/Dereliction of Duty/Scrolls of Banastor bug.  You should install even if it hasn't affected you yet! This fixpack attempts to address ALL dialogue, quest, scripting, plot, and most item bugs in the base game of Dragon Age: Origins.  It also restores much previously inaccessible content.
State.Name: Qwinn's Ultimate DAO Fixpack v3.52

State.Author: Ryan Paul Fialcowitz
State.Description: Overhauls the random encounters in the game.
State.Name: Random Encounters Overhaul

State.Author: EclipseWTF
State.Description: This is a small worldmap change, with the goal to make it look more realistic ^^
State.Name: Realistic Worldmap

State.Author: Kronaras
State.Description: Bigger Witherfang
State.Name: Rescaled Witherfang

State.Author: veteran_gamer
State.Description: This file makes shale a bit larger, bring her more to life :]
State.Name: Resized Shale

State.Author: jolly2807
State.Description: A retexture of Shale to meet higher resolution standards
State.Name: Shale Retextured HD

State.Author: Quciksilverk
State.Description: This mod is intended to scale certain shields to be a little bigger and to improve the proportion of them on your character.
State.Name: Shield Scale Mod

State.Author: untamedfuture
State.Description: Changes Sigrun\'s Legionnaire Scout Armor so that it matches her Legion of the Dead comrades. No stats changed, purely aesthetic.
State.Name: Sigrun of the Dead

State.Author: Reav3r
State.Description: Finally, a reasonable mod to skip the intro to Ostagar.
State.Name: Skip Ostagar

State.Author: hdhd
State.Description: This mod gives you the option to skip the Fade.
State.Name: Skip the Fade

State.Author: IceBuckets
State.Description: Overhauls the Tevinter (human) NPCs in-game to be wearing proper Tevinter attire as seen in Dragon Age: Inquisition
State.Name: Tevinter Nights

State.Author: DarthParametric
State.Description: Adds new outfits on NPC children
State.Name: The Childrens Closet

State.Author: DarthParametric
State.Description: Adds new outfits on NPC children
State.Name: The Childrens Closet

State.Author: Rennn
State.Description: A project to enhance Dragon Age\'s worst textures, and to fix graphical inconsistencies, without hurting performance or consuming excess RAM or VRAM.
State.Name: Theta HD

State.Author: darthbdaman
State.Description: Makes the guard that joins the player during the Tower of Ishal quest into a Rogue who can pick locks
State.Name: Tower Guard Rogue

State.Author: i9h
State.Description: A remake of the [url=http://www.dragonagenexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=958]VigilanceFixed[/url] mod.
State.Name: Vigilance weapon appearance fix alternative

State.Author: JOG
State.Description: This mod changes the rotten yellowish teeth of all characters to a white color.
State.Name: White Teeth

State.Author: darthbdaman
State.Description: This mod increases the number of items that have set bonuses, by allowing certain items to act as substitutes for others in sets, and by adding in some new sets. All features and specific items are optional, and can be removed at the user's discretion.
State.Name: Expanded Item Sets

State.Author: Dragonagefun
State.Description: Dragon Age Origins faster combat, inspired by Dragon Age 2.  Also added another file that allows faster run speed for all NPC & PC by 20%, in and out of combat.
State.Name: Origins Faster Combat

State.Author: Angel
State.Description: If you use the console, you have probably found that that what you\'re typing doesn\'t show up. This will fix that problem.
State.Name: Make CONSOLE commands visible

State.Author: palipride47
State.Description: An update to several DA:O codices based on either updated or altered lore that has come out since Origins was launched.
State.Name: Updated Codex for Updated Canon

State.Author: AmstradHero
State.Description: The blight is over, but the darkspawn threat is far from finished. In the Frostback mountains rumours of dangerous beasts threaten to plunge Fereldan and Orlais into chaos and war once again.
State.Name: The Shattered War

State.Author: SuranaDragon
State.Description:
A quick fix for AmstradHero's The Shattered War if the Forest Grove puzzle with the two statues isn't working properly for you.



Note: I am not affiliated with AmstradHero.  If they want me to take this down, I will.
State.Name: Shattered War - Grove Fix

State.Author: kzelsama
State.Description: This mod adds new hairstyles available at character creation. Included are some of Ren\'s and idkrrr\'s hairstyles, as well as the Lady of the Forest hair.
State.Name: More Hairstyles

State.Author: dainbramage
State.Description: A collection of gameplay fixes, tweaks and quality of life changes.
State.Name: Dain's Fixes

State.Author: Symonius
State.Description:
This mod is an expansion of the army you command at the final battle.



Every vanilla army is now expanded with new units (knights and archers for Redcliffe, crossbowman and vanguards for Orzammar and so on)



There are also 3 new armies you can unlock for the climax: Corrupted Circle, Wild Creatures and Undeads.
State.Name: Climax Army Enhanced

State.Author: Entopie
State.Description: Armor and weapon ports from DA2 to DAO
State.Name: Loincloth Fashion

State.Author: Elelith SplitCoreGaming
State.Description: Hated the ugly blotchy item textures so figured I'd fix a couple, but the thing got a little out of hand. So I have been (very) slowly retexturing parts of the game.
State.Name: Retexturing DAO

Original.Name: Teaser Normals Textures and Spectrals March 16-3973-0-01.rar

State.Author: Elelith SplitCoreGaming
State.Description: Hated the ugly blotchy item textures so figured I'd fix a couple, but the thing got a little out of hand. So I have been (very) slowly retexturing parts of the game.

State.Description: Hated the ugly blotchy item textures so figured I'd fix a couple, but the thing got a little out of hand. So I have been (very) slowly retexturing parts of the game.
State.Name: Retexturing DAO

State.Author: NewActionPotential
State.Description: This mod utilizes ESRGAN (Enhanced Super-Resolution Generative Adversarial Networks) to upscale over 2200 textures by 4x, 8x, and even 16x. Multiple pre-trained models were used to reduce DDS compression artifacts, remove aliasing, and add detail. This is now my second attempt, and I will continue to update this mod into the future.
State.Name: AP Neural Enhanced Textures

State.Author: NewActionPotential
State.Description: This mod utilizes ESRGAN (Enhanced Super-Resolution Generative Adversarial Networks) to upscale over 2200 textures by 4x, 8x, and even 16x. Multiple pre-trained models were used to reduce DDS compression artifacts, remove aliasing, and add detail. This is now my second attempt, and I will continue to update this mod into the future.
State.Name: AP Neural Enhanced Textures

State.Author: dalishious
State.Description: New textures for aravels, Dalish tents and halla
State.Name: Some Dalish Textures

State.Author: Catachrism
State.Description: Desire Demon Retexture 4k adult and lore friendly
State.Name: Desire Demon HD Retexture Catachrism

State.Author: Catachrism
State.Description: Lady of The Forest HD Retexture
State.Name: Lady of The Forest HD Retexture Catachrism

State.Description: Ogre HD Retexture by Catachrism, Lore friendly more detail than vanilla Ogre
State.Name: Ogre HD Retexture Catachrism

State.Author: yixura
State.Description: Replaces the textures and tints of the default noble dresses for all races.
State.Name: Noble Dress Overhaul

State.Author: hoarous
State.Description: Retextures all light armors to comply with lore established in later games.
State.Name: Retcon Light Armor Texture Rehaul

State.Author: hsli
State.Description: Bring DA2 Isabela and Flemeth model to DAO
State.Name: DA2 Isabela and Flemeth to DAO

State.Author: incendiaire
State.Description: This mod will replace Merrill and Keeper Marethari from the Dalish origin story with versions that more closely resemble their DA2 counterparts, for the sake of visual continuity.
State.Name: DA2 Merrill and Marethari for DAO

Original.Name: SarahCousland's - be more elfy (or sassy) Dalish Dialogue Redesigned-5404-2-0-1619751289.7z

State.Author: SarahCousland
State.Description: Revises Tamlen, Merrill, Ashalle, Paivel & Fenarel's dialogue for the Dalish Elf Origin. Allows Mahariel to have more knowledge of elven lore and spoken language. Also adds some sassy, affectionate, and emotional conversation responses. Removes gender check for romancing Tamlen. Edits dialogue during the Urn of Sacred Ashes quest.
State.Name: Be More Elfy (or sassy) - Dalish Dialogue Redesigned

Original.Name: SC's (Tamlen x Guardian) Sacred Ashes Dialogue Redesigned-5404-2-0-1619751185.7z

State.Author: SarahCousland
State.Description: Revises Tamlen, Merrill, Ashalle, Paivel & Fenarel's dialogue for the Dalish Elf Origin. Allows Mahariel to have more knowledge of elven lore and spoken language. Also adds some sassy, affectionate, and emotional conversation responses. Removes gender check for romancing Tamlen. Edits dialogue during the Urn of Sacred Ashes quest.
State.Name: Be More Elfy (or sassy) - Dalish Dialogue Redesigned

State.Author: CaldazarILIX
State.Description: Changes some dialogues during the mage origin.

State.Author: sapphim
State.Description: Restoration of cut Oghren content
State.Name: Bye Oghren - Dialogue Restoration

State.Author: AMENSIGN
State.Description: Adds 300 presets of haircut and 38 presets of beard for a male dwarfs.
State.Name: Schwarzalbenheim

State.Author: boodrl
State.Description: As the description says I plan to add more hairstyles for Dragon Age: Origins and Awakening. This project intends to make hairstyles not only for adult characters but also for the younger models (Children).
State.Name: Additional Hairs for DA by boodrl

State.Author: boodrl
State.Description: As the description says I plan to add more hairstyles for Dragon Age: Origins and Awakening. This project intends to make hairstyles not only for adult characters but also for the younger models (Children).

State.Author: boodrl
State.Description: As the description says I plan to add more hairstyles for Dragon Age: Origins and Awakening. This project intends to make hairstyles not only for adult characters but also for the younger models (Children).

State.Author: Shanamah
State.Description: Some changes to follower & NPC equipment in the DLCs, and a few minor cameos.
State.Name: DLC Tweaks and Cameos

State.Author: Shanamah
State.Description: Some changes to follower & NPC equipment in the DLCs, and a few minor cameos.
State.Name: DLC Tweaks and Cameos

State.Author: Shanamah
State.Description: Some changes to follower & NPC equipment in the DLCs, and a few minor cameos.
State.Name: DLC Tweaks and Cameos

State.Author: Dalishious
State.Description: Gives Tranquil NPCs the familiar brand from later games (specifically the DA:I design)
State.Name: Tranquil Brand 2.0

State.Author: theskymoves
State.Description: Adds the unique longbow Far Song to the upgraded inventory of Redcliffe Village’s blacksmith, Owen.
State.Name: TSM Happy Owen Sells Far Song

State.Author: setiweb
State.Description: Wilhelm's Cottage and Shale's starter quest restored.  Makes saving the village a little easier.  Lloyd is a master duelist.  Teleport between the upper and lower areas of Redcliffe.  Face every possible enemy for more XP.  Customize your own merchant.
State.Name: Redcliffe Revival

State.Author: takingcasualties
State.Description: The Warden now receives a wearable amulet when Alistair gives them the rose.
State.Name: Alistair's Rose (As Reward)

State.Author: Symonius
State.Description: This mod adds all Tier 8 and 9 materials of Awakenings to DAO and other campaigns
State.Name: Awakening Materials in DAO

State.Author: ladyofnemesis
State.Description: Weapons and armor for your Cousland Warden
State.Name: Cousland Armory

State.Author: darthbdaman
State.Description: Adjusts Daveth's skills so they match his supposed abilities, and fixes a bug which gives Jory various archery talents.
State.Name: Daveth and Jory Ability Tweaks

State.Author: balaurbondoc
State.Description: Revisiting the Dwarf Noble Origin in three small ways: 1) Bhelen actually looks like the youngest brother; 2) King Endrin is wearing Dwarven Noble Armor during the ceremony instead of some random mage-like robes, and 3) Lord Harrowmont is now wearing his noble clothing as well.
State.Name: Dwarf Noble Origin Revisited

Original.Name: Main File - Grey Wardens of Ferelden-3258-2-5.zip

State.Author: TommyIrianto
State.Description: This mod will give you DA2 style Grey Warden armors and weapons for DA:O. This mod also changes the appearances of all Grey Warden NPCs into wearing a uniform Grey Warden armors.
State.Name: Grey Wardens of Ferelden

Original.Name: Aldous isn't a Tranquil - Chantry Robes version-4050-1-0.7z

State.Author: theskymoves
State.Description: Brother Aldous, the querulous codger scholar in the Human Noble origin, wears the robes of a Tranquil. This mod changes his gear to either the generic non-magical robes or Chantry robes.
State.Name: TSM Aldous isn't a Tranquil

Original.Name: Better Mages Better Templars WTF Tranquil for DAO and DAA-4723-2-0-1568571101.7z

State.Author: theskymoves
State.Description: A small, modular collection of vanilla equipment tweaks for Templar and Mage NPCs, to address logic and continuity issues in both Dragon Age: Origins and Awakening.
State.Name: TSM Better Mages Better Templars WTF Tranquil for DAO and DAA

State.Author: theskymoves
State.Description: Gives the items from the Grey Wardens of Ferelden mod stats much closer to those of vanilla DAO gear.
State.Name: TSM Grey Wardens of Ferelden Rebalanced

State.Author: theskymoves
State.Description: Unifies the material and tiering of vanilla Dragon Age: Origins templar armour parts, and assigns a model to the invisible templar boots.
State.Name: TSM Templar Armour Fixes

State.Author: theskymoves
State.Description: When encountered during the prelude in the King’s Camp at Ostagar, Wynne is wearing Tranquil robes. She also wears Tranquil robes in endgame epilogue scenes (boon ceremony, Warden’s funeral). I’ve replaced the Tranquil robes with her proper Circle mage Senior Enchanter robes.
State.Name: TSM Wynne Robe Fix Complete

State.Author: Symonius
State.Description: Upgrades (or downgrades) all your equipped items to the selected Tier material.
State.Name: Upgrade Items Script

State.Author: Terra_Ex
State.Description:
CharGenMorph Compiler automates the process of merging chargenmorphcfg.xml files, searching through all override directories and reconstructing a singular "master" xml file containing all the values.



Gone are the days of manually editing xml files and painfully having to eyeball the differences between files - CharGenMorph Comp
State.Name: CharGenMorph Compiler

State.Author: elys
State.Description: A native G2DA (*.gda) editor.
State.Name: GDApp - GDA Editor

State.Author: Dracomies
State.Description:
This is the continuation of Dragon Age Redesigned. 



If file is hidden, it is also here:

http://social.bioware.com/project/1205/#files
State.Name: Dragon Age Redesigned

State.Author: Kunnusta
State.Description: AI upscaled cutscenes
State.Name: 1080p Cutscenes

State.Author: kzelsama
State.Description: This mod adds new hairstyles available at character creation. Included are some of Ren\'s and idkrrr\'s hairstyles, as well as the Lady of the Forest hair.
State.Name: More Hairstyles
